    • makeMove

      public boolean makeMove​(int curCol, int curRow, int newCol, int newRow)
      Attempts to make a move on the board.
      Parameters:
      curCol - Column of piece to move
      curRow - Row of piece to move
      newCol - Column of place to move to
      newRow - Row of place to move to
      Returns:
      Returns true if the move was possible and executed

    • getTurn

      public int getTurn()
      This method returns which player gets to play in the current turn.
      Returns:
      0 for white, 1 for black.

    • setTurn

      public void setTurn()

    • canBeAttacked

      private boolean canBeAttacked​(int newCol, int newRow)
      Returns if the piece can be attacked.
      Parameters:
      newCol - Column of piece to check
      newRow - Row of piece to check
      Returns:
      Returns true if the piece can be attacked

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Ways to escape check 1. move king (aka check the 8 squares for is vaild move) 2. attack attacker (aka canBeAttacked on attacker square 3. block (aka canBeAttacked or isValid move for each piece in opposite colors list on each of the in between squares)
      Returns:
      Returns true if the game is over

      public void setColor()
